mapper.sql: id, nick_name, avatar_url, gender, language, province, city, country
mapper.insert: insert into xilewang_user (id, nick_name, avatar_url,gender, language, province, city, country) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xilewang_user set nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avatar_url = #{avatarUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, language = #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country = #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
